javadoc: Data structure to set bits to indicate in use.

methods.name: put
methods.comment:
Puts the given boolean value in the boolean array at
 the given index

methods.javadoc:
Sets the value at the given index to 0.
@param index the index to set to 0.
methods.name: remove
methods.comment: Sets the value at the given index to 0.

methods.name: get
methods.comment: Returns the boolean at the given index

return.comment:
The boolean value at the given index. A false will
 be return for any non-negative index not initialized to
 another value.

methods.javadoc: Returns the index of the last non-null or non-zero element in the array.
methods.name: getLastNonEmptyIndex
methods.comment: Returns the index of the last non-null or non-zero element in the array.

name: BooleanArray
comment: Data structure to set bits to indicate in use.
